channel.title: WePresent on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in WePresent on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Riz Ahmed to ‘Stretch Culture’ as WePresent Guest Curator (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: WePresent, the arts platform of WeTransfer, has unveiled Academy Award and Emmy Award winner Riz Ahmed as its fifth guest curator, marking a reunion between the multi-hyphenate artist and the platform
